questions.statement: I answer very fast to guest messages
questions.subtext: I often check mail and reply right away

questions.statement: My replies are not standard but personal
questions.subtext: I know this is where our hospitality begins

questions.statement: I follow up when I give someone a task
questions.subtext: I am responsible until the task is done

questions.statement: I scan arriving guests so I know their mood
questions.subtext: I change the way I check-in accordingly

questions.statement: My priority is to make guest feel welcome
questions.subtext: I never start with asking for passports

questions.statement: I can do a standard check-in in 60 seconds
questions.subtext: Some travellers are tired and want the key

questions.statement: I check-in groups with the group leader
questions.subtext: Others don't have to wait and can relax

questions.statement: I don't tell guests check-in time is 14:00
questions.subtext: They can check-in whenever the room is ready

questions.statement: I don't show stress when there is a problem
questions.subtext: I know it only makes guests nervous

questions.statement: I pay attention when guests check-out
questions.subtext: I go outside and wait until the car has left

questions.statement: I did at least one amazing thing last week
questions.subtext: It was special and I am proud of it

questions.statement: I am proactive with guests and my team
questions.subtext: I don't wait until people tell me what to do

questions.statement: I scan every guest every time
questions.subtext: I can see what people need before they ask

questions.statement: I actively help others to develop and grow
questions.subtext: I give my friends advise and suggestions

questions.statement: I create unique surprises for my guests
questions.subtext: I do more than offering free things

questions.statement: I know great music creates a great vibe
questions.subtext: I listen and make sure our music is right

questions.statement: I offer guests to use other BED facilities
questions.subtext: I let them know about the big pool in Nimman

questions.statement: It's annoying when a room key doesn't work
questions.subtext: I take my master key and go up with them

questions.statement: I do whatever I can if travellers need help
questions.subtext: For example if they loose their passport

questions.statement: I give my friends honest feedback
questions.subtext: I actively help to develop our team

questions.statement: I ask for feedback on my performance
questions.subtext: I make effort to learn and develop myself

questions.statement: I can answer most questions about BED
questions.subtext: I know the rooms and people in all hotels

questions.statement: I am fully focused during breakfast
questions.subtext: I know the magic happens from 07:00-10:00

questions.statement: I peeled my onion
questions.subtext: I act like a friend instead of an employee

questions.statement: I call ahead when guests go to another BED
questions.subtext: I make sure they are welcomed as friends

questions.statement: I use ChatGPT in my daily work
questions.subtext: I use it for messages and helping guests

questions.statement: I use ChatGPT for complex tasks
questions.subtext: I use it for research and problem solving

questions.statement: I don't gossip
questions.subtext: I don't criticize people who are not here

questions.statement: I know that rules exist for a reason
questions.subtext: Without the reason I can change the rules

questions.statement: I am confident about my own judgment
questions.subtext: I make my own decisions without permission

questions.statement: I take responsibility for the whole hotel
questions.subtext: I check rooms and public areas

questions.statement: I consider myself a positive person
questions.subtext: I don't complain but look for solutions

questions.statement: I don't pass-on problems to others
questions.subtext: I find solutions and follow up until fixed

questions.statement: I am not afraid of the CEO or my coach
questions.subtext: I know I am allowed to make mistakes

questions.statement: I consider myself a full member of the team
questions.subtext: I take responsibility just like the others
